title: Knorr Chicken Cubes
features: Package Quantity: 1 Knorr Chicken Cubes pack includes 50 chicken bouillon cubes; each cube has a weight of 8g and is wrapped in foil separately for convenient usage
Ingredients: Knorr low sodium bouillon cubes are made from the long-boiled whole chicken, vegetable oil, sugar, corn flour, and salt; they also include preservatives
Healthy Protein Diet: The chicken bouillon cubes are excellent sources of protein and iron; you get the dream combo of nutrition and good taste

Special Feature: You can add gravy cubes to chicken organic cream, chicken base paste, chicken soup, and Indian chicken gravy; cook multiple style cuisines, including mughlai, chinese, continental, etc.
Product Care: Store them in a cool & dry place; the best is to refrigerate them if you have already opened the packet
description: This is the made in Nigeria brand very popular in giving jollof rice its seasoned taste.
